text:
My name is Jared Levitan, I'm the Chief Growth
Officer at Onica.

First and foremost, we want to be able to
help our citizenry in Canada, and of course
in the U.S.

And we get to work with very interesting customers
in the health care space, in the education

space, in the core government space... helping
them create more efficiencies using technology
and using cloud.
Onica is unique in the ecosystem.

First and foremost, we only focus on AWS, which
I believe is key to our success.

We worked with a big utility out of British
Columbia called, BC Hydro.

And they were needing to run a report that
was taking them 30 plus hours to run, with
a multitude of different servers and desktops.

Even though they were utility in BC which
has strict compliance, they decided this made
sense for them to try AWS.

And instead of using three variables, they
could now use five variables, like the weather,

the oil price... and it was taking them under
an hour to run, at a cost of ten dollars.

So when we made that comparison between hundreds
of thousands of dollars and ten dollars, everyone
was blown away.
It was a massive success.
Great use case for the cloud.

We really enjoy working with AWS because their
engagement model is so different to what you
see with traditional vendors out there.

They are not trying to shove things down your
throat.

They are educating you so that you take advantage
of their platform in the best possible way.

Ultimately, we're in the service business
together, and everything about service is time.

And the faster we can respond, the faster
we that can do things successfully for the customer...
ultimately leads to a higher quality service.
